summary: This is an internal email from the Federal Bureau of Prisons' Public Information Office forwarding an approved press release about Jeffrey Epstein. It was sent on August 10, 2019, to be distributed to media contacts following Epstein's death.

events.title: Approval and Distribution of Epstein Press Release
events.description: The Federal Bureau of Prisons' Public Information Office approves and prepares to distribute a press release regarding Jeffrey Epstein to approximately 50 media contacts.

locations: MCC New York (Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York)
keyFacts: The document is an internal email dated August 10, 2019, from the Federal Bureau of Prisons' Public Information Office.
It concerns the approval and distribution of a press release about Jeffrey Epstein to media contacts.
The press release was to be sent to about 50 reporters who had contacted the Office of Public Affairs (OPA).
The Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York (MCC NY) was also to distribute the release to media who contacted them directly.
A non-public Microsoft Word version was provided to the Office of Legislative Affairs (OLA) for potential use in responding to congressional inquiries.
